name: Hostile Escape Tactics
description: Training in escaping from hostile environments and avoiding capture.

cards.title: Urban Escape Route Planning
cards.description: Identifying multiple escape routes in urban environments before engaging in an operation.
cards.bulletpoints: Mapping safe zones, exploiting blind spots, blending with crowds
cards.summaryText: Pre-load secondary and tertiary exit paths, mark safe houses, and pattern crowd flows so you can vanish through blind spots the moment pressure hits.

cards.title: Restraint Evasion
cards.description: Techniques to escape from handcuffs, zip ties, and rope bindings.
cards.bulletpoints: Shim techniques, breaking zip ties, exploiting binding weaknesses
cards.summaryText: Drill covert shimming, friction burns, and leverage bursts so you can slip cuffs, pop ties, or unravel knots before captors realize their control collapsed.
